title: Companion Approval Guide
content: pole Consuming a tadpole requires to have done the 1st Tadpole dream Simply win the Persuasion Check with Shadowheart to start using the Tadpoles Shadowheart + Shadowheart Camp or In party Astarion will be seen reading the Necromancy of Thay after acquiring it. React by suggesting to give it to Gale or state "Stop reading it" Requirement/s: Give the Necromancy of Thay to Astarion Astarion - Camp or In party Tav/Durge reads the Necromancy of Thay Requirement/s: Do not give the Necromancy of Thay
